name: Azenta, Inc.
description: Azenta, Inc. is a leading provider of sample management solutions and life sciences services, dedicated to accelerating the advancement of scientific research and discovery. Founded in 2021 and headquartered in Chelmsford, Massachusetts, Azenta focuses on providing a comprehensive suite of services including biobanking, genomics, and laboratory informatics. The company supports researchers and organizations in managing biological samples, ensuring the highest standards of quality and compliance. Azenta’s innovative solutions utilize state-of-the-art technology and automated systems to streamline sample processing, storage, and retrieval. With a commitment to enhancing sample integrity and data accuracy, Azenta plays a crucial role in the life sciences sector, serving pharmaceutical, biotechnology, and academic institutions. The company is also involved in the growing fields of personalized medicine and genomics, providing essential tools and services that drive advancements in health and treatment. As the life sciences industry continues to evolve, Azenta is poised to be a key player in supporting research initiatives that lead to groundbreaking discoveries and improved patient outcomes.
